name: MetaMate
description: MetaMate – A Unique Social & Dating NFT Metaverse. It's a a unique social and dating metaverse combining a digital dating platform with a metaverse NFT game. Our vision and statements are to build a unique metaverse world where people around the globe could connect, start dating, engage fun mini-games for dating and other exciting activities, and to introduce a new NFT standard - social NFT standard, which will offset the lack of social aspect of the current 1155 and 721 NFT standards. Project highlights 1️⃣The pioneer in combining a digital dating platform with an NFT metaverse – the two dominating trends which have been and will be constantly and significantly expanding in the upcoming time. 2️⃣The first NFT game with social & dating feature, which is casual and capable of attracting both men and women players. 3️⃣The first to initiate social NFT standard to optimize the efficiency of data analyzing, advertising campaigns, matching mechanism, etc. 4️⃣Focus on free-to-play, invest-to-earn, user-generated features. 5️⃣Develop a complete ecosystem with a Web 3.0 product (Mate Plus), a Cross-chain NFT Marketplace product, and an NFT Ventures
